main.name: Surpass And Service
main.description: We aim to provide users with quality data analysis services, extracting useful information from a number of district-centric and decentralized exchanges to help users analyze the trend of token value.  At the same time, we also pay close attention to the dynamic of hot people in real time for you to prevent you from missing the opportunity to become rich
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

subscription.degree: Add keywords, the whole network monitoring, instant push, always one step faster
subscription.description: Personalized customized news, microblog, Twitter, exchange announcements, etc., once set, lifelong benefits.
Twitter user ID, such as @elonmusk, is the string of characters following the @.  You can focus directly on the leaderboard.

monitor.title: Monitor exchange new currency launched
monitor.description: Select the corresponding exchange, and then input your token information, we will notify you the first time the token is listed.

monitor.title: Monitoring an address
monitor.description: We will inform you as soon as any transaction information occurs at this address.
